publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3796.1 Dr Richard Simpson: The NHS and the Independent Sector—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3796) in the name of Mary Scanlon, leave out from "and pays" to end and insert "with its high level of patient approval and welcomes the Scottish Regional Treatment Centre’s contribution to maintaining Stracathro Hospital as both a local and regional resource; notes the success of the nationalisation of the HCI hospital in Clydebank, now the Golden Jubilee National Hospital, and recognises the contribution of both these units and their staff in achieving the continuing reduction in waiting times."
